messages.subject: Saigo Takamori Videos
messages.msgSnippet: The NHK production Tobu ga Gotoku is available from NHK for a very pricey 27,700 yen for a four cassettes. the hompage is http://www.amuse-soft.co.jp/ . This
messages.messageBody:
The NHK production Tobu ga Gotoku is available from NHK for a very pricey 27,700 yen for a four cassettes. the hompage is http://www.amuse-soft.co.jp/ . This again is the condensed version 49 episodes into 7 and a half hours. Taharazaka was done by VAP video company. I'm not sure where it might be available if it still is but I think it was as expensive as the other one. These videos plus many others are available for rent in most big Japanese video stores like Tsutaya.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
